website_summaries.verdict: Works to kill fleas as well as other insect pests, including ticks, roaches, and silverfish.
pros: Has a 30-day lifespan to eliminate adult fleas, eggs, and larvae
Offered at a reasonable price point, and it will deliver 200- to 400-square-feet of coverage area per bottle
Works well against heavy infestations of fleas and ticks in the home
cons: Not safe to be used around food or for direct contact with humans or animals

customer_reviews.title: Worked amazingly well!
customer_reviews.text: The house has 3 dogs and a cat, so bugs happen, 1 night I noticed fleas were everywhere, if I stood still I would get 20-30 fleas on me immediately. That morning I ordered this to be same day delivery. I sprinkled this powder liberally on the rug and left it for over an hour, nice lemon smell by the way! then I vacuumed the entire rug 3 times to get all the chemical lifted. I could not find another flea in the rug and the vacuum was LOADED!!! and within 2 hours I saw every flea it picked up was dead. Couldn't ask for a faster fix to a nasty problem!
customer_reviews.author: JBell

customer_reviews.title: Bad Marketing for products
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is pretty good, seems to be a little bit more potent than baking soda and gets any bugs or fleas that may be left. However, it would have been much better if I had know that it was not pet friendly, meaning you cannot leave your pet out while this product is on your carpet if they might lick it up. The listing shows “happy pet happy home” which is a bit confusing. It needs to be more clear that this shouldn’t come into contact with any adults, children, or pets. Make sure to make your marketing correct please!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for us and the cats are happy
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that a carpet powder could help eliminate a flea problem but decided it was worth a try. We have a rental home and the landlord didn't want to put tile or wood floors in, so we're stuck with the carpet. It took two complete applications over a month to kill all the flea generations, but that along with giving the two cats a capstar and a frontline treatment has totally eliminated the fleas. Ordered a second jar to keep on hand just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Should wear a face mask while pouring, but does its job. Need 2-3 cans to fill a 1-bed apartment
customer_reviews.text: It's flea powder. It does its job. I didn't like that some dust would visibly float up and pollute the room's air when pouring it over the carpet. But what chemical designed to kill something *wouldn't* pollute your house in some way. Either way, one can fills a non-New-York apartment size bedroom (including under the bed), so you might need 2-3 cans to cover an entire 1-bed apartment full of carpet.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Would not use anything else
customer_reviews.text: my dog had fleas and brought them inside the house, I research a lot of product and ended up trying Adams because of the great reviews, I was skeptical first but I used it as directed, sprinkled all over the carpet and let it sit ( I left mine for 2 1/2 days) then vacuum. Also used the spray for furniture and rugs, and the shampoo from Adams. it worked like a charm. first try all the nasty fleas were gone!! I never tried anything else before so I can't compare, but I have a stock ready for the next time if needed. I would recommend this product for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Faby71

customer_reviews.title: My vacuum was able to pick it up easily but i do have a shark vacuum that is ...
customer_reviews.text: seems to have helped although i couldn't leave it on for 24hrs i left it on for only and hr or so. I didn't have any problems with any dust from this product but i did wear gloves and a mask just in case, My vacuum was able to pick it up easily but i do have a shark vacuum that is pretty good, other vacuums may have some trouble if they are not very good. the smell was super strong and a very chemical with a hint of citrus smell.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Shannon Krohn

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions exactly. Fleas reinfested a day later. It was a gallon sized jug of Ortho Home Defense that finally got the job done. The lesson I learned from this is skip products like this powder and go straight to the big guns. Smells alright though.
customer_reviews.author: M. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Definitely kills Fleas!
customer_reviews.text: Considering the epidemic proportions of flea infestations in the Pacific Northwest, this product did what it professed to do and didn't destroy my vacuum. You need to be thorough and diligent though. It doesn't perform miracles.
customer_reviews.author: Jerilyn Brown

customer_reviews.title: very fine dust may blow everywhere. Think before you sprinkle
customer_reviews.text: Comes in paper tube container sorta sealed in a bag.. Seems to work well But be WARNED very fine dust will blow everywhere. I used it on rugs where animals sleep over Hardwood floor. So I dragged them outside to driveway, sweep them, dusted , sweep dust in fabric and let them in the sun for 5 hours. Sweep tops off fabric again and brought into th house. Didn't want the dust to just blow around.
customer_reviews.author: JDwashoe

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff straight up does not kill eggs or larvae, I can confirm that. Dusted the carpet pretty heavily and let sit for the full 24 hours. In less than a week the eggs either hatched or the larvae had matured and there were fleas everywhere. My cat has a flea collar AND Revolution medication, I had washed all my bedding during the process, and they were for sure still in the carpet. The smell is weird but not toxic smelling or anything, it is just not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Lita Lita Lita

customer_reviews.title: Desperate to kill fleas!
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning of the summer, fleas were out of control!!! My apartment complex was no longer spraying due to the pandemic and quarantine, so I was left to my own devices. Well, I bought this, along with at least 35 other products... I'm not actually sure which individual product worked best, or if it was the combination, but it took about two days to finally rid the apartment of the pests. Adams has always worked in the past, so I consider it a win!
customer_reviews.author: April Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance is way too strong
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was effective or not because I used it in combination with another treatment I’ve used before but wow, the scent is too strong and uncomfortable! It has been 7 hours since I vacuumed it up and it still stinks, so if you are sensitive to fragrance, skip this one. My throat is irritated, even though I wore a mask while using. Also it came in a box with other products and it spilled all over my items. Not enough to ruin anything but I wish it was packaged better in a baggie or something
customer_reviews.author: L Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for in my home. Then get it and the label states it is not safe to use anywhere around humans or pets and to not come in contact with it in any way adrift or directly. Your supposed to leave it sit for at least 60 minutes but ideally 24 hours for it to work. In YOUR home but no one can go near it. It should have said in the description it wasn’t safe to use in home because after reading label and directions it’s clearly not.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective, but Stinky
customer_reviews.text: I was comfortable using this product in rooms that I could close and vent to the outside for 24 hours. The product did work to address flea infestation, but the chemical smell lingers for days. I would use it again, but not in open areas and large living spaces. Wear a mask or bandana when applying, sweeping, and vacuuming, as it does hang in the air. Change clothes after vacuuming. I would not recommend applying to furniture and bedding for any reason.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good carpet flea control powder
customer_reviews.text: I really like using this product to help ensure that there are no fleas on their bedding or cat tree. I think it works pretty well because I never really see fleas around the house or anything. I have hardwood floors so the only carpeted or fabric things they have are their bedding and cat trees and this definitely works for that. The scent is really strong but when she vacuum it up it dissipates a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Very effective & odor ok!
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well on deep carpet! Never had fleas in house before so wasn’t sure which product to use. This worked great! Laid out 8x10 area rug in garage & let sit for 48 hours! Vacuumed 2 more days & then brought in & vacuumed thoroughly again! Not one flea left! Problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: janice stephens

customer_reviews.title: Dont use if your gonna be home!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to try and alleviate a flea issue, saw it had good reviews and went with it. If you use this stuff, make sure to leave the house while you let it sit as this stuff has an obnoxiously strong odor! and on top of that ot didnt really do anythong for the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Not killing the fleas.
customer_reviews.text: Not helping with the fleas at all. Package does not have a glued in type of lid so I received this item twice and both times it was all over the place before I could even use it. But NOT helping with the flea issue at all from what I can see and it has been over a week that I 1st used it. Also has a very strong odor, not offensive chemical but headache inducing citrus.
customer_reviews.author: Hwoodis

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome. Flea problems has really plummeted
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome. Flea problems has really plummeted. WARNING: I got this on my feet, didn't think anything and ten mins later I was washing my feet as they.. burned. So keep away from kids and skin, wash ASAP if you get anything on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does it work? Maybe. Maybe not
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if it works. Used several times betwene vacuums per the instructions. Still saw fleas hop onto my leg. Maybe it works, maybe it doesnt. Finally moved to the Ortho spray and finished the war.
customer_reviews.author: Jon DE

customer_reviews.title: Works if used correctly
customer_reviews.text: Use this product ICW bombs, treating your dogs and yard, and your fleas will disappear. Don't forget to vaccum often. I have zero fleas now (according to the flea trap, and our skin).
customer_reviews.author: charles slayton

customer_reviews.title: Only product that works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing to ever kill fleas!!! I was infested for 3 years and did everything to kill them. They'd go away for a while with other products but then come back. Its been 6 months since I used this product and I still have not seen one flea!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Dog Must Be Off Carpet for Extended Time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my carpet but haven’t used it because it’s going to be difficult to find a window where the dogs don’t have access to the carpet for the required length of time. One star off for ease of use for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: Ineffective. We bought this product to her three times. Followed the instructions. Spread it on the carpet just like it told us to, and swept it in. Left it for more than 24 hours. And then vacuumed it up. The fleas never went away, and the powder is so fine that it gets everywhere. My husband and I wore masks and gloves to be safe. An absolute waste of money do not bother.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Noble

customer_reviews.title: Still works
customer_reviews.text: I finally ran out of the first bottle I bought in 2004, but it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne S

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good preventative measure especially in areas that have a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good preventative measure especially in areas that have a lot of fleas or ticks. I just don’t like the fumes that come after vacuuming. You do have to wait about 30 minutes before vaccumming so keep that in mind. Also keeps pets away from areas that have been treated just as a safety measure. Overall I wouldn’t buy it again just feels like a lot of toxins in the air and takes a few days to clear it out.
customer_reviews.author: Lien Tran

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The scent is not to bad. I cannot attest to its effectiveness. I treated my cats with Sentry fipoguard. That product does not work. I am waiting for a flea collar to arrive. Hopefully that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Works but not well
customer_reviews.text: It works but not well. Fleas came back in three weeks. It stinks all to hell for about 36 hours after you've vacuumed it up. This includes using a large air purifier in the locked room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I hope so for my old dog
customer_reviews.text: I hope this works. My dog is 18 years old. And this year was the first year he ever had a flea. So im being ocd on everything. To make sure he never gets another one. I will write a review after i see if the product works
customer_reviews.author: Christina Scott

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately Did Not Work
customer_reviews.text: A WHOLE lot of work went into this, and I am still being attacked :( Going to try out the Ortho Home Defense everyone keeps mentioning. Waste of time and money. A LOT of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lamb

customer_reviews.title: the fleas are gone and so are the annoying bug bites
customer_reviews.text: I used this along with a fogger and flea medicine. It was all out war and I won. The cats are no longer allowed outside, the fleas are gone and so are the annoying bug bites.
customer_reviews.author: Sevev

customer_reviews.title: It arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these and when i received the box the box had powder residue on the exterior so i knew that there was something wrong. When I opened the box it looked like one of the caps came off on one of the products and the powder was all over the box. I don't know how to handle this as the only option is to return due to damage item but it doesn't make sense to return this as its pretty much empty. I took pictures of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Working So Far
customer_reviews.text: It has a very strong lemon scent, We've had it on the floors for 4 days and fleas are still getting on our legs and feet in the areas we have the powder spread out.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it works
customer_reviews.text: Messy and smelly. Since I was not able to eliminate the fleas on our dog yet I can’t honestly say if this worked it didn’t. Just seems messy and smells.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: I used this for flea on carpets. It is easy to use. However, it doesn’t smell good and I think it induces rhinitis for me... People who want to use it must be very careful. Protecting yourself with face masks is very necessary. And the scents would last for a quite long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sea

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, smell is not all that pleasant... but I bought the shampoo at a store. The fleas died within 10 min. This is why I bought the carpet stuff as well, so any fleas on the carpet or bedding died too. I haven't seen any fleas since using this product a few days ago. I am quite happy and so is my sweet boy!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M. Hensley

customer_reviews.title: It works.... but
customer_reviews.text: This did get rid of the fleas in the carpet it took a couple applications and one bottle doesn’t do a lot of carpet but happy it killed them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressed. Fleas still there after treatment.
customer_reviews.text: I used this in one of my rental properties that had carpet infested with fleas. I used as directed. It got rid of most of the fleas, but they came back in a few weeks. Had to use an industrial strength flea killer to finally get rid of them.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton J.

customer_reviews.title: Works well!!️
customer_reviews.text: OMG works immediately don’t delay make your purchase. Wasted so much money before I bought this product.
customer_reviews.author: Crissydione

customer_reviews.title: Dust cloud
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t work as well as I had hoped for. It was really dusty and the scent was not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Tumlinson-Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Products fine, packaging is not
customer_reviews.text: The actual product is fine, however the packaging was horrible. It came loose in a box and containers were already open, so there was flea powder everywhere, and coming out of the cracks of the box. A decent amount of product was lost due to this, and honestly seems pretty dangerous to be shipped without anything to secure the powder in the canisters.
customer_reviews.author: Checkers115

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I can only assume it's keeping the fleas away. I use Advantage on my pets as well. I like the scent, too.
customer_reviews.author: Patches

customer_reviews.title: Adams is the Best
customer_reviews.text: It does the job it's designed to do. Easy to use just spread around, nice smell. Kills everything, You really get your money's worth because it really works Gooooood. !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy
customer_reviews.text: Its not at all like powder its more grain like salt. it smells really good but that about all. Like carpet freshner
customer_reviews.author: Erinn

customer_reviews.title: we forgot to put the mailing receipt inside the box
customer_reviews.text: it is on its way back but we forgot to put the inside ticket in the box . ups has it now they put their receipt on it .
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: Still had several fleas after using this so did another treatment and let it sit for double the time requirement. Did not kill any fleas. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Robles

customer_reviews.title: Lame
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda pissed when I got this as it’s NOT safe to use while pets are around. My pets live at my house, what am I supposed to do while I have this in the rug? I specifically bought it cause I thought it was safe for them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not for tile!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get off tile floor I know its for carpets. Jury’s still out on effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce U

customer_reviews.title: Too much money/work put in for no pay off.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work. Says right on the container that it kills all fleas and flea eggs. And keeps them away for like a year. And they came back in like two months. So all that work, putting it into the carpet, letting it sit for 24 hours then vacuuming it up, did nothing.
customer_reviews.author: JOHNATHON H WIMER

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1 per room to treat
customer_reviews.text: The scent was very mild, I only wish I had bought more than 1 can. My house is much bigger than my apartment lol
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Wright

customer_reviews.title: Fleas still there
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all I bought the containers followed all the instructions even let it sit 24 hours vacuumed several times afterwards washed everything fleas are still here in so disappointed waisted money
customer_reviews.author: Doreen OBrian

customer_reviews.title: I used this and washed the dogs with a good flea shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I no longer have fleas in the carpets. I used this and washed the dogs with a good flea shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: andrena patrice wright

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Can't live without a sprinkle throughout the house come flea time! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: It worked for about a week and then the fleas ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about a week and then the fleas came back. Buy the pill your dog eats and they won't come back
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Flra killer that Really Works as stated!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Finally a product that kills the Fleas and the Flea Larvae!!! Will buy again and again as needed!
customer_reviews.author: Crazycatlady93

customer_reviews.title: Clearer age-appropriate needs to be understandable.
customer_reviews.text: I could not be certain that my 3-month-old kitten wouldn't be harmful when applied to him.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila-Ann Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Did the job with no crazy smells. Dries fast..had not seen any bugs since using it once. And my dog is happy not having bugs on her.
customer_reviews.author: roxane boardman

customer_reviews.title: Works better then flea bombs!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to sprinkle on carpet, sweep into carpet to get best coverage, then sit a few hours before vacuuming. Left a pleasant smell and kills what went into the bag added bonus
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ann Scott

customer_reviews.title: my home felt cleaner after one application, but fleas ...
customer_reviews.text: my home felt cleaner after one application, but fleas are still everywhere. so it didnt work, but it leaves a really strong citrusy smell.
customer_reviews.author: Burrito

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't happy with open product
customer_reviews.text: I reported that the item seal was broken it spilled out into the box I didn't get any response
customer_reviews.author: joyce duncan

customer_reviews.title: This was one of the worst products I have used
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the worst products I have used. The powder makes it so hard to breathe and makes your carpets feel crunchy. Plus didn't help kill fleas. Borax worked wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and bought it with high expectations. However the week after using it we started seeing way too many flees jumping on our feet. The vet came across eggs on one of the pets and we were hoping it would be helpful before they hatched. Did no help.
customer_reviews.author: Samiksha dangat

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected but totally clogged up my vacuum cleaner. I would recommend vacuuming small areas at a time them emptying the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: worked well but the cats were crazy after treatment, not sure why
customer_reviews.author: sickkitty

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely one of my favorite products for dealing with fleas in the house
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely one of my favorite products for dealing with fleas in the house. We don't deal with fleas often but when we do I go for this product first. I sprinkle it into the carpet, wait a week and vac the carpets and repeat. The pesticides contained are effective against all life stages of the flea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy
customer_reviews.text: I will not buy this product again. The scent of this product is extremely overpowering. I placed it on the carpet and let it sit for 30 minutes and it caused my eyes to water and it took several days to get the scent out of the house. Bad product.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Worked as it claimed it would, but the residue ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked as it claimed it would, but the residue was everywhere. The powder clogged our vacuum; however, if you're looking for something extremely effective-this is it. Only had to use it once and haven't had a problem since.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes a few times and a couple bottles
customer_reviews.text: Seem to work just have to reapply a few times and a couple bottles
customer_reviews.author: Big daddy

customer_reviews.title: Did not work!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on a couch and it did not work. I even applied it a 2nd time and still did not work. Would not recommend this product .
customer_reviews.author: albert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked good to rid our house of fleas we used with bug bombs too
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Flea Powder
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my neighbor who did not think her dog needed a flea collar. Really helped her overcome the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Fred J. Apel

customer_reviews.title: Use a bag vacuum to throw it away
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I used on the carpets let it set in the carpet for 24 hrs for the best results.
customer_reviews.author: Michael lestoric

customer_reviews.title: damaged goods.
customer_reviews.text: The package was damaged all of the powder was spilled in the shipping box.
customer_reviews.author: darryl dexter

customer_reviews.title: Not a single application solution.
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple applications and I still ended up buying a spray version. Kills initially but they came back.
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Works well but does have a strong chemical odor
customer_reviews.text: Killed the fleas but does have a rather strong odor. Be sure to change your vacuum filter after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, and did not clog my vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Smells great, and did not clog my vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Packing
customer_reviews.text: I got Flea Powder all over my other enclosed purchase. Should be put in plastic to avoid this.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Odor is very strong, make a plan to not ...
customer_reviews.text: Odor is very strong, make a plan to not be in the home while this sets and even a bit after you vacuum it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The smell is very intense and gave us a headache ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell is very intense and gave us a headache immediately but it does appear to work as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: The powder is fine and it's irritating to inhale
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. The powder is fine and it's irritating to inhale. Wear a dust mask while spreading it around. I used a 3M N-95 mask which blocks all of it. The dust soon settles.
customer_reviews.author: Cpt. Pat

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Has no effect that I could discern. Had to purchase a real anti flea medicine
customer_reviews.author: jdaniher

customer_reviews.title: Average at best
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work as well as some other products I bought. I think borax works the best. Save money and buy that instead.
customer_reviews.author: dovescry

customer_reviews.title: Flea powder
customer_reviews.text: We must have some dam tuff fleas because this stuff didn't touch em
customer_reviews.author: Mugsi

customer_reviews.title: came open
customer_reviews.text: 0 stars if I could. Horrible! This product came opened and it contaminated other products I bought! DO not order! I had to throw it out so I couldn’t even get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: esther sternberg

customer_reviews.title: Need a lot of ventilation
customer_reviews.text: It may work good but the Oder is very strong
customer_reviews.author: Charlie K

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: This product did nothing. 14 hours in, with my floors covered in this product, fleas were still jumping on me. Please refund my money. I’ll have to try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kistler

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this product to anyone and buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this powder when we couldn't get rid of a flea infestation. It was making us, the dog, and the cat all completely miserable. When I got this product I used it exactly as directed in my apartment. I bought two bottles and was able to treat my whole 900 sq foot apartment. The first week after application I noticed less and less fleas on the critters and less flea bites. It has now been over a month since I applied this product and we haven't had a single fleas in weeks! I would definitely recommend this product to anyone and buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Myers

customer_reviews.title: It’s better so the product works
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, but one thing to keep in mind is that you will not be able to be in room for 24 HRs. It’s better so the product works
customer_reviews.author: BetsyG

customer_reviews.title: it really did not do the job. I had ...
customer_reviews.text: it really did not do the job. I had to take my dog to the vet for a flea dip.
customer_reviews.author: grannie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Read all the good reviews and was excited to buy it, applied just as instructed.. 24 hours later no difference, did not kill anything..
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Jackson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS POISON!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this product. It makes sense that people would want this as a carpet cleaner if fleas or ticks are present, but most of the time that's because one has pets. You CANNOT use this around pets or kids, and it has to stay on carpeting for 24 hours before vacuuming. Simply put, it's sheer poison. And it arrived spilling out of its container--when I swept it up it DISCOLORED MY WOOD FLOOR!!!! I threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and worked. Just had to keep the cat out of the room for an hour waiting to vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L Manion

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: I love this and hate it. Love - It worked in my opinion. within 3-4 days of applying this to the carpet, the flea problem was gone. Hate- the smell lasts forever, and while applying and vacuuming, it is so over powering. I live in an apartment with one windows and one sliding door, and that wasn't enough to ventilate it. Also, it WILL clog your vacuum filter. It clogged my Dyson up within minutes, making it turn on and off repeatedly. So overall, it did its job. It just caused many unwanted side effects on the way there.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but not something you just sprinkle and vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Works good, just make sure to put it down before work. Leave it, then vacuum later. It takes a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Had a flea infestation, used this on both sides ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a flea infestation, used this on both sides of carpets, a slight odor at first, but goes away, along with all fleas.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Show far looks good seems to work well my dog will wright. Her review later
customer_reviews.author: David Evans

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Smelled pretty good. Somehow got a flea infestation in 1 room, killed them no problem.
customer_reviews.author: EricJBarker1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well packed well I'll be back thanks great price
customer_reviews.author: James & Renee Hoffman & Family

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Tried this powder as instructed, not only didn't't it work, but my cat refuses to touch any surface the powder was used on. A voi Would strongly not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Boyles

customer_reviews.title: Skip the mess and buy the spray instead
customer_reviews.text: It may have worked some but it makes an awful mess and I ended up buying the spray anyway and that did work, same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Adams Flea & Tick Carpet Powder
product_meta.description: Size:16 ouncesAdams Carpet Powder kills fleas and ticks on the carpet. It contains an Insect Growth regulator (IGR), Nylar, and the botanically-derived insecticide Linalool that kills all four stages of the flea life cycle: adults, eggs, larvae, and pupae. It breaks the flea life cycle and controls re-infestation for up to 365 days. Leaves a fresh citrus scent.
feature_bullets: Kills fleas , ticks, flea eggs, and flea larvae
Contains an insect growth regulator (IGR) to kill and prevent flea development for up to 30 days
Breaks the flea life cycle and controls re-infestation for up to 365 days
One 16oz container treats 1-2 rooms, 200-400 square feet
Freshens and deodorizes home with pleasant citrus scent

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
